Frontend Developer Father of Two Melbourne Based

Hi, I am Ray. I am a front-end developer who likes to build simple and intuitive applications.

Currently, I work at Omny Studio as a senior software engineer, building an application that manages podcast hosting and advertising. I work mainly with React, TypeScript, Graphql and Node.js. Please feel free to have a look at my Linkein for my full work experiences. Or download my full resume here
